an10.100:1: "Bhikkhus, without having abandoned these ten things, one is incapable of realizing arahantship. What ten? Lust, hatred, delusion, anger, hostility, denigration, insolence, envy, miserliness, and conceit. Without having abandoned these ten things, one is incapable of realizing arahantship.
